--- title: Toy Robot keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A toy robot, toy application where the toy robot doesn't fall off the toy table" description: "A toy robot, toy application where the toy robot doesn't fall off the toy table" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install -e .

Documentation

For documentation, refer here.

Run

To run the project in command line,

python main.py --cmd_file_path <path_to_txt_file>

As an example:

{% raw %} 
!python main.py --cmd_file_path ./example1.txt 

ToyRobot facing new direction: WEST
ToyRobot facing new direction: NORTH
New position on table: (0, 1)
ToyRobot, currently at (0, 1) and facing NORTH!
{% endraw %}
